```python
[
  '(:action initiate
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and
                    (available ?entity)
                    (not (initiated ?entity))
                    (not (full ?resource)))
    :effect (and
              (initiated ?entity)
              (increase (member_count ?resource) 1)))',
  '(:action set
  :parameters (?npc - entity ?ss - society ?property - property_type)
  :precondition (and
                  (initiated ?npc)
                  (member ?npc)
                  (not (property_set ?ss ?property)))
  :effect (property_set ?ss ?property))',
  '(:action create
    :parameters (?npc - entity ?ss - society ?entity - entity_type)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?npc)
                    (member ?npc ?ss)
                    (not (created ?ss ?entity)))
    :effect (created ?ss ?entity))',
  '(:action teach
    :parameters (?teacher - entity ?student - entity ?concept - concept)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?student)
                    (member ?student)
                    (not (knowledge ?student ?concept)))
    :effect (knowledge ?student ?concept))',
  '(:action read
  :parameters (?agent - entity ?resource - resource_type)
  :precondition (and
                 (initiated ?agent)
                 (member ?agent)
                 (not (read_status ?resource)))
  :effect (read_status ?resource))'
]
```
